sentences.en: He showed unfeigned satisfaction at his friend's success.
sentences.cn: 他对朋友的成功表现出真正的满足。

sentences.en: Her interest in people was unfeigned.
sentences.cn: 她对人的关心是真诚的.

sentences.en: If actual grandparents are not at hand, no family should have too hard a time finding substitute ones to whom to give unfeigned homage.
sentences.cn: 如果实际生活中祖父母不在身边，没有哪个家庭会艰辛的为了找到替代祖父母们让我们给以真诚的尊敬。

sentences.en: Their hosts received them with unfeigned pleasure.
sentences.cn: 主人带着由衷的喜悦接待了他们.

words.tran_cn: 由衷地；不虚伪地；诚心地
